Sentencas: LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 (LNF) is one of the promising cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells, but reacts with a zirconia-based electrolyte.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: To prevent this undesirable reaction, a ceria phase has been introduced in between the LNF cathode and electrolyte.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: On the other hand, the ceria phase itself could react with lanthanum-based perovskite oxides.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: We examined the reactivity of LNF and Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta (samaria doped ceria (SDC)) in this study.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: The mixtures of LNF and SDC were sintered at temperatures between 1123 K and 1623 K and the resultants were analyzed by X-ray diffraction together with the Rietveld analysis.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: We also measured the activity of electrochemical cells with a LNF-SDC composite layer in between the LNF cathode and zirconia-based electrolyte.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: The lattice parameters of each phase are clarified and a possible reaction scheme is proposed.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: The cell activity was high, but was influenced by the sintering temperature of the composite.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: Both chemical stability and physical property of the cathode can affect the cell activity.
Titulo: Reactivity of LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 with samaria doped ceria
